description: This package initializes and builds type safe code using TypeScript and json schema files.

scripts.init: npm install bga-ts-template && npx bga-init KiriaiTheDuel "Nevin Foster nevin.foster2@gmail.com" src --typescript --scss --vscode-extension-pack --php-8.2 --gameinfos.jsonc --gameoptions.jsonc --gamepreferences.jsonc --stats.jsonc --gamestates.jsonc

author: NevinAF
